document.title: Clear Aligner Treatment Plan for Lower Teeth
document.summary: Abraham, your treatment involves using clear aligners to straighten your lower teeth over an estimated 4–6 months. As this is a moderate case, it will require extensive attachments and regular in-clinic monitoring to ensure the best possible results.
next_steps: Attend scheduled in-clinic appointments for monitoring
Discuss any questions with your dentist at Bitesoft

edited_summary: Your treatment involves the use of lingual braces on the lower teeth, designed to improve alignment over an estimated period of 6–8 months. This type of braces is placed on the inner side of the teeth, making them less visible. Due to the moderate complexity of your case, you'll have in-clinic visits for monitoring to ensure everything progresses smoothly. Extensive attachments will be utilized to assist with the necessary tooth movements. Additionally, whitening is included as part of your treatment plan to enhance your smile.
